entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
